summary: This is a confidential email from a forensic psychologist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It appears to be official communication about Epstein's status or condition while in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email correspondence, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, while he was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a confidential email regarding Jeffrey Epstein dated July 24, 2019.
Epstein was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York under inmate number #76318-054.
The communication originates from a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service at the Bureau of Prisons.
The document is marked as containing potentially sensitive information requiring proper handling.
This communication occurred while Epstein was in federal custody prior to his death.
